title: Tempus opens new maintenance facility
text:
Tempus Aircraft Sales & Service
Tempus Aircraft Sales & Service will provide all service in Arizona
DENVER , Oct. 21, Tempus Aircraft Sales & Service (Tempus) announced today that it will be opening a new Authorized Pilatus Service Center at the Scottsdale Airport (SDL). The facility will offer extensive aircraft service for all Pilatus aircraft including
- Scheduled/Unscheduled Maintenance.
- AOG/Mobile Repair.
- Major Repairs.
- Engine Changes & Borescopes.
- Modifications.
- Engine Hot Section Restorations.
- Inspections.
- Pre-buy inspections.
Service appointments will be available as early as Nov. 1, 2015 . Aircraft owners may call the Tempus toll free telephone number 1-844-8TEMPUS to schedule a service appointment.
Located at 8014 E. McClain Drive in Scottsdale, Arizona , this Authorized Pilatus Service Center will utilize parts of the Signature Flight Support facility and conduct all Pilatus service within Arizona . Previously, Landmark Aviation operated as the Authorized Pilatus Satellite Service Center for the region.
"Aircraft owners are innately aware of the importance of good and timely maintenance," said Jack Gulbin , CEO of Tempus. "As a leader in aviation and an expert in Pilatus aircraft, we look forward to building a closer relationship with our customer base and being a service provider that aircraft owners can trust."
Based in Denver at the Centennial Airport (APA), Tempus is the sole provider of Pilatus sales and service in the Southwestern territory of United States . The Scottsdale facility will be Tempus' second Authorized Pilatus Service Center with four additional Satellite Service Centers in Santa Ana, California ; Houston ; McAllen, Texas and Denton, Texas .
To learn more about Tempus, visit tempusaircraft.com .
About Tempus Aircraft Sales & Service: Tempus Aircraft Sales & Service is a leading aviation company that provides a wide array of services to an extensive and diverse client base of corporations, governments and individuals throughout the world. Founded in 2007, Tempus has established a global network of comprehensive and innovative services with a commitment to excellence, expertise and philanthropy. Headquartered in Denver , Tempus' 36,000-square-foot facility also houses the sales, service and parts departments. Tempus has satellite sales offices in Austin, Texas , and Santa Ana, California , with charter services based in Scottsdale, Arizona .
